item.description:
The Best Food Ever!

Get a double dose of supreme nutrition education with
Todd "Livingstone" Conant & Daniel Vitalis of ElixirCraft

2 Top Nutrition Experts!
2 Floors. Back to Back!
2 1/2 Hours!
$30 Investment (Includes Live-food demo & Elixir!)

What does "You Are What You Eat" really mean?
How did Todd "accidently" loose 100 lbs?
What are the "secrets" to longevity?


Space is Limited to 35. Pay in advance to reserve your spot.
The cost includes an amazing Elixir from ElixirCraft!


events.myspace.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=events.detail&eventID=424704.38076



----------

I'm told Blue Moon added raw items to menu. - Mara

----------
For BRM posted files, please check the files section:
rawfood.meetup.com/343/files/

To promote BRM, please print & post tear-strip flyers:
files.meetup.com/733136/BostonRawFoodMeetupTear-stripFlyer.pdf

For upcoming BRM events, please check the calendar:
rawfood.meetup.com/343/calendar/

For other raw events around New England, please visit:
NewEnglandRawCommunity.com
item.name: The Best Food Ever!
